snippet.title: Tactics Ogre: Reborn | Announcement trailer
snippet.description:
The crown jewel of the tactical role-playing genre, is reborn!

Tactics Ogre: Reborn is coming on November 11, 2022 on Nintendo Switch™, PlayStation®5, PlayStation®4 and PC via STEAM®.
Pre-order now to get exclusive bonus: http://tactics-ogre.square-enix-games.com/#buy-now

Tactics Ogre: Reborn features updated game design, fully-voiced cutscenes, improved graphics, and sound. Immerse yourself in the fascinating world and intrigue of Tactics Ogre like never before!
In this age of conflict, which path will you choose?

Tactics Ogre: Reborn will be available as a physical and digital Standard Edition on PS5, PS4 and Nintendo Switch, with a digital-only Standard Edition available on PC via STEAM. A Digital Premium Edition will also be available on PS5, PS4 and PC via STEAM.

#TacticsOgre 

Twitter: https://twitter.com/SquareEnix 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/SquareEnix
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SquareEnix
